tha-ap227:0.3_0: held together by those senior monks,
tha-ap227:2.1_0: since I was doing nothing wrong
tha-ap227:2.3_0: I’m not aware of having any such
tha-ap227:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap227:4.1_0: These seven eons of the world,
tha-ap227:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap227:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Abhibhū.
tha-ap227:7.1_0: and he is the fifth kind of senior.
